passage_text: The five major oceans on Earth are the Pacific Ocean, the Atlantic Ocean, the Indian Ocean, the Arctic Ocean, and the Southern Ocean. The Pacific Ocean, the Earth's largest ocean, flows to the west of the Americas and along the eastern edge of Asia.
